messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On September 13, DET. X. Y. Allen responded to claims of counterfeit money circulating in the Westside Market. Primary informants were Mrs. Jacobs, a vendor, and Mr. Silva, a customer. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. Z. A. Bryan - OPERATIONS Det. Allen, Jr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective B. C. Davis and Detective D. E. Edwards liaised with the treasury department. JONES 12:45 Counterfeit Mrs. Jacobs presented counterfeit bills, while Mr. Silva recalled a suspicious seller. Inspection. Technician Timothy verified the fake currency. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Allen Jr, Det. Davis, Det. Edwards OPERATIONS Lt. Bryan INFORMANT Silva, Eric 165 Pine Road, Westside, New Mexico 219-1235. 94825. JONES 12:45 Counterfeit By 2:15 PM, Detectives Allen, Davis, and Edwards, supervised by Lieutenant Bryan, tracked purchases to a nearby vendor. Captain F. G. Howard proposed a covert operation. Sergeant H. I. Jackson and Sergeant J. K. Lee set up surveillance. By 4:20 PM, a counterfeit operation was discovered and dismantled. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Allen Jr, Det. Davis, Det. Edwards OPERATIONS Lt. Bryan AFFIDAVIT - Counterfeit Report 1) Verified Counterfeit Bills 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Purchase Records 5) Market CCTV (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE L. Miller W.M.P.D. 38.160 P86 4075 Jacobs, LISA NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 220-4375 DETECTIVE: X. ALLEN ITEM: 86-5850- 115 CRIME: 12:45 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 85360 - CONFIRMED Jane Doe DATE 3/24/25 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. X. Y. Allen  Officer Context: On September 13, DET. X. Y. Allen responded to claims of counterfeit money circulating in the Westside Market. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. Z. A. Bryan  Officer Context: Lt. Z. A. Bryan - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective B. C. Davis  Officer Context: Detective B. C. Davis and Detective D. E. Edwards liaised with the treasury department. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective D. E. Edwards  Officer Context: Detective B. C. Davis and Detective D. E. Edwards liaised with the treasury department. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Timothy  Officer Context: Inspection. Technician Timothy verified the fake currency. Officer Role: Technician (from the Crime Lab) Officer Name: Detective Allen  Officer Context: By 2:15 PM, Detectives Allen, Davis, and Edwards, supervised by Lieutenant Bryan, tracked purchases to a nearby vendor. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Davis  Officer Context: By 2:15 PM, Detectives Allen, Davis, and Edwards, supervised by Lieutenant Bryan, tracked purchases to a nearby vendor. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Edwards  Officer Context: By 2:15 PM, Detectives Allen, Davis, and Edwards, supervised by Lieutenant Bryan, tracked purchases to a nearby vendor. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain F. G. Howard  Officer Context: Captain F. G. Howard proposed a covert operation. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant H. I. Jackson  Officer Context: Sergeant H. I. Jackson and Sergeant J. K. Lee set up surveillance. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant J. K. Lee Officer Context: Sergeant H. I. Jackson and Sergeant J. K. Lee set up surveillance. Officer Role: Sergeant
